name: Hookshot Tower
description:
My submission for Major Jam 3

I didn't have much free time to work on this one, but I wanted to participate in another game jam, and I wanted to test the "hookshot" idea. I don't normally make puzzle gams, but game jams are a great opportunity to try something new, so that's what I went with!

Hookshot tower is a short game about using a hookshot to traverse rooms and solve puzzles.

Controls:

Move - W, A, S, D / Arrow keys

Hookshot - Space / X
